body:
Do you want to be the next #1 on Kaggle? Have what it takes to work alongside the current #1 and two former #1's? Joining team DataRobot means you'll learn and work with Owen, Xavier, and Sergey to change the way we do data science.As a Lead Data Scientists Consultant in Japan, you will be developing opportunities, analysing customer requirements, and providing consulting service in complex technical environments. You will be comfortable leading technical demonstrations of Datarobot product and discussions of specifics of various machine learning algorithms and preprocessing methods. You will work with prospects and clients for developing solutions to complex predictive analytic problems involving many diverse input data sources and high volume real-time implementation scenarios.
You must have all of the necessary skills: 
3+ years of real-world business experience 
Hands experience integrating predictive models in corporate environments 
Strong customer interaction skills experience with customers in consulting roles 
Must possess excellent organisational, communication, writing and interpersonal skills (English and Japanese)
Experience using code (python/R) to manipulate datasets
And at least four of the following: 
Fluency with SQL on one or more of the following databases - Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, Postgres 
Strong coding skills in Python or R 
Experience with cloud computing platforms 
Experience with Hadoop and related Big Data technologies
Experience working in an agile sales environment 
Experience with NoSQL databases 
Previous sales engineering experience

alert_message: This job post has expired (either the position was filled or the post is no longer listed). You are viewing an archived version.
body:
As a pioneer and industry leader in data-driven entertainment products, Zynga continues to maintain a strong emphasis on the use of data and data science to improve our extensive network of live and upcoming games. We are looking for an exceptional Senior Product Manager for Analytics to join the organization of the Chief Data Officer.
Responsibilities:
Responsible for the full product lifecycle, from writing specifications, working across multi-disciplinary teams: design, data science, and engineering to develop internal analytic tools and machine learning solutions used by our existing and new game studios.  
Exhibit sound product judgment, ability to formulate product strategy and present clear measurable objectives that will lead to achieving our business goals. 
Expected to provide valuable input into business cases based on in-depth data analysis and demonstrate how that analysis impacts key product metrics. 
Required Skills:
3+ years of experience in product management or equivalent domain experience in mobile gaming or data science strongly preferred
Ability to create wire-frames, product specifications and white papers
Strong project management skills and ability to present work to executive staff
Exceptional data analysis skills
Strong passion for games and creating fun and compelling user experiences
Outstanding written/oral, organizational, analytical skills, and attention to detail
Must be a self-starter, a team-player and driven
Previous start-up, social networking and/or consulting experience is a strong plus
Bachelors or graduate degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics is strongly preferred

alert_message: This job post has expired (either the position was filled or the post is no longer listed). You are viewing an archived version.
body:
Job description
We are looking for talented and motivated professionals for the development of our project in the field of Data Science, Data collection, Data Mining and analysis. For developing recommendation engine and predict for our millions of customers.
If you are crazy about huge amounts of data, like to structure the information, to form hypotheses and draw conclusions so, you are viewing the correct position!
As head of data science, you'll be refining the vision and mission of the team and lead a talented team of scientists. You will be working closely with Software Engineers and Product Management to integrate enhancements and new algorithms to our big data platform to improve our products and solutions.
You will be responsible for the fundamental data science that powers our platform. This will include data mining, data collection statistical analysis, predictive analytics and related work. You will work closely with our software engineers and Lead our Data Scientist to understand requirements and develop solutions. We value creativity, a strong work ethic, and the ability to work well in a team as well as lead the team. In exchange, we offer a competitive base salary, benefits, and flexibility, when you need it.
Main Responsibilities
Demonstrate expertise and be capable of mentoring other team members in the use of data science tools such as R, SQL, noSQL, Python, Spark, Hadoop and Big Data technologies
Create and validate machine learning methods and statistical models that deliver insight about what delights our customers, where they have opportunities to do more and how to maximize customer experience
Design and test algorithms that automate customer and business insight and generate action at various touch points on and off the website and mobile apps
Guide across the company to implement new algorithms and methods based on your work by presenting findings in a clear and confident manner
Write clean code for use by engineers and other analysts in the organization
Define data needs, consistency and cleaning for the Data team and other teams
Keep an eye on and R&D any evolving technologies and data sources to help enhance data
Pitch in new ideas and proposals and how each will be tackled at a Data, Insight and Action touch points
In order to achieve this you will need to love a fast paced and challenging environment, be tenacious, creative, collaborative and visual. In addition to this you will need a blend of the following skills and qualifications:
A Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Statistics, Finance, or Mathematics is preferred
Significant experience of extracting, transforming and working with large sets of data
Experience with advanced analytic techniques such as decision trees, support vector machines, neural networks and multivariate regression.
Extensive experience of working with business metrics, ideally in an e-commerce/digital setting
Analytical experience in marketing /customer database analytics such as: analytic segmentation, direct marketing test design, response analysis, measurement strategy development, ROI analysis, financial modeling
Experience across a broad range of tech and analytic toolsets including cluster analysis, regression, building models
Passion for digital business, mobile, media and emerging technologies
Requirements
Eligibility to live and work in UAE and in India
To apply, email: jobs@awok.com
WHO WE ARE:
AWOK.com is an integrated eCommerce company founded in 2013 and at the completion of our 2nd year we have already become the leading online store in UAE with year-to-year growth.
AWOK.com was founded with the vision of creating a solution for the problem incurred by everyday consumers where they face the choice between good product or good price, since inception we have strived to never settle for something less than perfect in both areas; be it the product quality or the price; we have done it successfully in the past and will continue to do so. We are focused on Low Prices and Quality Products in categories such as, Mobile Phones, Tables, Laptops, Electronics, Home & Kitchen Appliances, Health & Beauty Products, Apparels, Watch & Jewellery Products, DSLR & SLR Cameras and more.

body:
Senior Data Scientist, Machine Learning (Berlin)
Did you participate in the ICDM2015 competition? Were you a top performer with a high score and the drive to do it all again? Roq.ad wants to hire you! Get noticed for your achievements and include your kaggle username in either your cover letter or CV. You never know – it might just help your chances of joining the Roq.ad Team!
Who is Roq.ad?
Roq.ad is an innovative Berlin based start-up, with a passion for Cross-Device Technology and a dedication to building a world-class technology company. As Europe’s leading multi-device company, our proprietary technology has already garnered industry-wide recognition. We were recently named one of the “Top 3 companies to watch in 2015” by Online Marketing Rockstars and acknowledged as a “Top 25 EU Business” by the European Tech Tour. 
Roq.ad’s primary offering is a cross-device user identification engine dedicated to Real-Time Advertising. We receive billions of events daily, process a graph structure that contains hundreds of millions of nodes, and generate efficient predictive models based on terabytes of data. Our daily routine is the core essence of Data Science.Sounds impressive?
Well, we here at Roq.ad are offering you the opportunity to join us in our Berlin office as a Senior Data Scientist, Machine Learning. Are you a top performing data scientist who is motivated by new challenges, enthusiastic about creating new technology, and excited about working with a talented team of data scientists? You could be our ideal candidate! Make an impact on today’s multi-device society and join the Roq.ad Team!
Your Responsibilities:
Leading the design and development of predictive algorithms to solve complex business challenges and extract information from data sets
Improving our capabilities in large-scale data mining, analysis, information retrieval, data visualization, ML & AI
Identifying market & technology trends and examining current data assets
Identifying data sources, assessing compliance of data sources, testing data quality and overlap, validating segments, reviewing data providers’ taxonomy
Validating data integrity
Your Skills:
Degree in Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Operations Research or an equivalent
Knowledgeable in using discrete math, linear algebra, probability & statistics to solve complex questions
3+ years of experience as a Senior Data Scientist in ad-tech industry 
Good understanding of RTB ecosystem
Proven experience with designing and developing Machine Learning algorithms
Proven experience with Data Mining and Information Retrieval
Experience with data visualization of large datasets and data pipelines
Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hadoop (HDFS, Hive, HBase, MapReduce), Apache Spark, Spark Streaming would be a plus
Fluency in English
What we offer:
Your job is one big adventure with new challenges every day
An amazing office located in the heart of Berlin
Unlimited supply of drinks, breakfast and fruits to keep you energized!
Valuable insights into entrepreneurship and the Berlin start-up scene
Work closely with the founders and a team of top performers and get first-hand insights on building an international company
 
Are you ready for Roq.ad?We are looking forward to receiving your application! Please send it to jobs@roq.ad
